short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will convert url into a QR code. Use your SmartPhone to browse the page from desktop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of typing the url in your smartPhone browser. Use this smart extension to create a QR code and scan with your phone to browse the page. Highly usefull for web developers and testers.
